title: KARUNANIDHI BOGGED DOWN BY 2G SPECTRUM SCAM AND FAMILY REVOLT IS TRYING TO BRUSH ASIDE TROUBLES BY CLAMORING FOR EELAM SAYS THE PIONEER
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana India’s Pioneer newspaper said in an editorial that Chief Minister Muthuvel Karunanidhi’s recent clamor to divide Sri Lanka and carve out a separate Tamil homeland has been done for a political mileage and it can also be seen as an attempt to brush aside all troubles in his own…
